title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 195.9 - Supervisory responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 195.9 - Supervisory responsibility

State Regulations
A licensee has an affirmative duty to provide supervision
to employees and for all business activities. Such supervision shall consist of
regular, frequent and consistent personal guidance, instruction, oversight and
superintendence by the qualifying license holder with respect to the general
business conducted by the firm and all matters relating
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
195.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
